TitleSection.title: Maakaf Community
TitleSection.subTitle: Open Source Israel
TitleSection.firstParagraph: The goal of the community is to connect Israeli developers
TitleSection.secondParagraph: who are interested in contributing to open source, with Israeli open source libraries.
TitleSection.thirdParagraph: Full details about the community can be found
TitleSection.discordLink: Click here for the temporary website

HomePage.title: Home page | Maakaf
HomePage.description: Maakaf is a community of open source developers

about.firstParagraph: We believe in sharing information and knowledge as a way to promote technology and innovation. Open source is an approach that allows us to collaborate in software development openly and transparently.
about.secondParagraph: When we talk about open source, we refer to software whose source code is available to the public for viewing, modification, and improvement. Open source gives us the opportunity to understand how software works, to enhance it, and to tailor it to our needs. We invite you to join us, to be impressed, to share, and to influence. Here in the Israeli open source community, there is a place for everyone, from beginners to experts.

maintainerForm.firstParagraph: Project maintainer and want to join Maakaf?
maintainerForm.secondParagraph: Random text that explains some things about combining projects for bypass,
maintainerForm.thirdParagraph: what to do to join, how the process works in general.

steps.title: how does the process works?
steps.step-1-p: Filling out a community membership form
steps.step-2-p: The project will be reviewed by one of the community managers
steps.step-3-p: Commencing work with the developers and advancing the project tasks

newbies.subTitle: Welcome to Open Source Israel
newbies.paragraph: Start Your Coding Journey Today! Ever wanted to learn how to code but didn't know where to start?  Open source is a great way to get started in coding. It's all about sharing and collaborating with other coders to create amazing things.

terms.title: Important concepts to know
terms.maintainers: Project owners who want to contribute their project to open source
terms.contributers: Discord users with prior experience in open source communities are invited to become Contributors after completing our quick onboarding process
terms.newbies: Our future generation. An uncut diamond. The one who is reading these lines right now.

linksSection.title: Where everything happening?
linksSection.paragraph1: A community website where you can learn about open source and get involved before joining the Discord server
linksSection.paragraph2: Project owners who want to contribute their project to open source
linksSection.paragraph3: Other groups that are active, primarily for coordinating events and making important announcements

members.title: MEMBERS
members.paragraph: Here you can meet the entire family! When your'e done, come to Discord

quotes.header: Open source is the foundation of a community that works together, shares knowledge, and collaborates to create something amazing

beOurFriends.title: What you get from being a Maakaf member

whatNow.title: What now?
whatNow.paragraph: It's simpler than it seems. Here will be another paragraph that encourages sharing and joining the community, telling how cool and nice the people are and how much they learn from doing things there. How will this make a person look at development differently and make a significant change in the world and in his life?

faqs.title: Qustions & answers
faqs.firstParagraph: It's worth trying our Questions & Answers section, and if the answer isn't there, we have the
faqs.secondParagraph: with genuinely, the nicest people you'll ever meet, who are always willing to help anyone who needs it

terms-of-use.title: Terms of Use
terms-of-use.firstParagraph: Welcome to Maakaf! We're thrilled to have you join our community of developers and programmers dedicated to contributing code to a diverse range of projects. Before you dive in, please take a moment to review the following terms of use. By accessing or using our website, you agree to abide by these terms and conditions.
terms-of-use.secondParagraph:
1. Acceptance of Terms: By accessing or using our website, you agree to be bound by these Terms of Use and all applicable laws and regulations. If you do not agree with any of these terms, you are prohibited from using or accessing this site.
2. Code of Conduct: We foster an inclusive and respectful community where all members are treated with dignity and respect. Please review and adhere to our Code of Conduct at all times.
3. Contributions: By submitting code or any other content to our website, you grant us a perpetual, irrevocable, worldwide, non-exclusive, royalty-free, sublicensable license to use, modify, adapt, publish, translate, distribute, and display such content in any form, media, or technology now known or later developed.
4. Intellectual Property: All code and content shared on our website are subject to the applicable intellectual property rights. You retain ownership of the code you contribute but grant other users the right to use, modify, and distribute your code in accordance with the open-source licenses applicable to the respective projects.
5. User Responsibilities: You are responsible for the content you contribute to our website and any consequences thereof. Please ensure that your contributions comply with our Contributor Guidelines and do not infringe upon the rights of others.
6. Privacy Policy: We respect your privacy and are committed to protecting your personal information. Our Privacy Policy outlines how we collect, use, and disclose your information when you use our website.
7. Disclaimer of Warranties: Our website is provided on an "as-is" and "as-available" basis without any warranties, express or implied. We do not guarantee the accuracy, completeness, or reliability of any content posted on our website.
8. Limitation of Liability: In no event shall we be liable for any direct, indirect, incidental, special, or consequential damages arising out of or in any way connected with your use of our website or the content posted therein.
9. Modification of Terms: We reserve the right to modify or revise these Terms of Use at any time without prior notice. Your continued use of our website after any such changes constitutes your acceptance of the new terms.
10. Governing Law: These Terms of Use shall be governed by and construed in accordance with the laws of the Israeli Judicial Authority, without regard to its conflict of law provisions.
terms-of-use.thirdParagraph:
If you have any questions or concerns about these terms, please contact us at Discord --> [https://discord.com/invite/a2VyCjRk2M].
Thank you for being a part of Maakaf!

privacy.title: Privacy Settings
privacy.firstParagraph: Protecting your privacy and the confidentiality of your personal information is of paramount importance to us. This Privacy Settings section outlines how we collect, use, and protect your data when you interact with our website.
privacy.secondParagraph:
1. Account Information: When you create an account on our website, we collect certain personal information such as your name, email address, and a password to secure your account. This information is essential for providing you with access to our platform and facilitating communication between you and other users.
2. Project Contributions: When you contribute code or introduce a project on our platform, certain information about you and your contributions may be visible to other users. This includes your username, the content you contribute, and any comments or discussions associated with your contributions. Please be mindful of the information you share and review our community guidelines for best practices.
3. Communication: We may use your email address to send you important updates about your account, notifications about activity related to your contributions, and newsletters or promotional materials if you opt-in to receive them. You can manage your communication preferences in your account settings.
4. Cookies and Tracking Technologies: We use cookies and similar tracking technologies to enhance your browsing experience, analyze website traffic, and personalize content. You can control cookies through your browser settings and opt-out of certain tracking technologies, but please note that disabling cookies may affect the functionality of our website.
5. Third-Party Services: Our website may integrate with third-party services such as social media platforms or analytics providers. These services may collect information about your interactions with our website, subject to their own privacy policies. We encourage you to review the privacy settings of these third-party services to understand how they handle your data.
6. Data Security: We implement industry-standard security measures to protect your personal information from unauthorized access, disclosure, alteration, or destruction. However, no method of transmission over the internet or electronic storage is 100% secure, and we cannot guarantee absolute security.
7. Data Retention: We will retain your personal information for as long as necessary to fulfill the purposes outlined in this Privacy Settings section, unless a longer retention period is required or permitted by law.
8. Updates to this Privacy Settings Section: We may update this Privacy Settings section from time to time to reflect changes in our practices or legal requirements. We will notify you of any material changes by posting a notice on our website or sending you an email.
9. Contact Us: If you have any questions, concerns, or requests regarding your privacy or this Privacy Settings section, please contact us at [contact@email.com].
privacy.thirdParagraph: By using our website, you consent to the terms outlined in this Privacy Settings section.
